alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Brunswick; Cumberland; Dinwiddie; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg; Nottoway; Powhatan; Prince Edward; Western Chesterfield; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 8:26PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Louisa, Cumberland, Nottoway, Goochland, western Dinwiddie, Powhatan, western Chesterfield, southeastern Mecklenburg, east central Prince Edward, eastern Lunenburg, Amelia, western Brunswick and Fluvanna Counties through 930 PM EST... At 823 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of showers extending from near Centenary to Burkeville to near Ebony. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... South Hill and Jetersville around 835 PM EST. Lawrenceville and Lake Monticello around 840 PM EST. Tobaccoville, Morven and Sunnyside around 845 PM EST. Alberta, Ballsville, Macon and Dundas around 850 PM EST. Powhatan and Trenholm around 855 PM EST. McKenney, Cartersville and Fort Pickett around 900 PM EST. Goochland and Fife around 905 PM EST. Wilsons, Gum Spring and Spainville around 910 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bacons Fork, Angola, Murdocks, Maidens, Forksville, Skinquarter, Wellville, Michaux, West View and Wares Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Brunswick; Cumberland; Dinwiddie; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg; Nottoway; Powhatan; Prince Edward; Western Chesterfield; Western Louisa
